item.title: Best Doomsday Preppers Episodes
item.description: Doomsday Preppers is an American reality television series that airs on the National Geographic Channel. Dr√§ger Equipment, Wise Food Storage Company and the United States Gold Bureau are sponsors of the show. Doomsday Preppers is an American reality documentary tv-series that was first aired in 2011 on National Geographic. See the best episodes of Doomsday Preppers below.
